Package ZuulBad

Class Environment

java.lang.Object
ZuulBad.Environment
public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
This class initializes all objects in the game, such as rooms, items, characters. It also sets up the starting point of the game.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Sarah Engelmayer, Katerina Matysova, Daniel Birk

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void addRoomConditions()
    Give the room a condition: Possibilities are setting up monsters, locking rooms and changing a normal room to a teleporter room.

    Create NPCs and put them in the intended room.

    • getItem

      public Item getItem​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Getter for an item available in this game. Used in other classes to control if a string represents an item of this game.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item that should be an item of this game
      Returns:
      the food item if the input string represents an item of this game
